title: I Am the Hope Diamond
description: Told through the fictitious eyes of the Hope Diamond, I Am the Hope Diamond is an informational book about the history of this amazing diamond. The book explains this diamond's incredible journey, including how it was discovered, who has owned it, and to which countries it has been taken. The book also describes its original size and shape, as well as how it has been altered through the years. Photographs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: carats, charities, diamonds, facets, jewels, museum, mystery, pendant, set
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Nouns                : Understand the use of plural nouns
awareness: Alphabetizing                : Arrange words in alphabetical order
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
